attributes.action: give Lewis Hamilton his victory back that was unfairly taken away from him by the FIA/Stewarts in the 2008 Belgium Grand Prix.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The decision to take Hamilton’s victory away in the Belgium GP was one of the worst in F1 history and puts doubts into many fans minds that the FIA are a fair sporting regulator.

Please sign if you want Hamilton’s victory to be given back as well as the championship points (Drivers and Constructors) that go with it.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
